text: læa meụ̄̀x phwk k̄heā dị̂ xxk pị pracạỵ h̄n̂ā kạb ỵālūt læa rị̀ phl k̄hxng k̄heā læ̂w phwk k̄heā k̆ kl̀āw ẁā xô phracêā k̄hxng phwk k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ pord thrng prathān khwām xdthn h̄ı̂ kæ̀ phwk k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ d̂wy t̄heid læa pord thrng h̄ı̂ mạ̀nkhng sụ̀ng thêā k̄hxng k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ læa pord thrng ch̀wy phwk k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ h̄ı̂ chna h̄enụ̄x phwk pt̩is̄eṭh ṣ̄rạthṭhā thậngh̄lāy
